caption:
After more than 5 amazing years and 240+ episodes, our longtime host Robert Stott is signing off from the Independent Thinking Podcast.

From Zoom calls to in-store visits, Rob has told the stories of Independent retailers across the country with heart, humor, and deep curiosity. His passion for this industry—and the people who power it—helped shape this podcast into what it is today: a platform that elevates the voices and victories of our Nationwide Marketing Group community.

While Rob is stepping into a new chapter, the podcast will continue—with new stories, new voices, and the same mission: to celebrate the Independent retail channel.

🎧 Listen to Rob’s farewell episode here: https://bit.ly/4k7eifb
 🙏 Drop a note in the comments to share your favorite memory or episode!

#IndependentThinking #NationwideMarketingGroup #IndependentRetail #SmallBusinessMatters #StorytellingThatMatters
